Title: They Call Me Bruce
Writer: David Randolph (screenplay), Johnny Yune (screenplay), Elliott Hong (screenplay), Tim Clawson (screenplay), Johnny Yune (story), Elliott Hong (story), Dale Trevillion (story)
Actors: Johnny Yune, Margaux Hemingway, Raf Mauro, Pam Huntington
Plot: A Korean man's resemblance to the legendary martial arts star Bruce Lee proves to be a mixed blessing when he stumbles onto the activities of the Mob.
